items.sentence: I can still remember the time when Tom fell out of the tree.
The police looked everywhere and could find no trace of Tom.
The only two languages Tom can speak are French and English.
I want to let Tom know that there\'s nothing to worry about.
Tom doesn\'t need to worry about that kind of thing anymore.
I\'m really glad to have met you and that we became friends.
I\'m the type who likes to think things over very carefully.
That would be like sawing off the branch you\'re sitting on.
I hope that this is the beginning of a beautiful friendship.
Tom and his family sold 20 head of cattle earlier this week.
